title: Functions of two Ministries amended
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The President has issued an extraordinary gazette notification amending the functions of two Ministries; the Ministry of Industries and the Ministry of Environment.
Accordingly, the institutional and legal framework of the two Ministries have been amended.
Fox Resorts and WNPS join forces to host a children’s art workshop at Fox Jaffna
Relief methods were discussed at the Cabinet meeting: Minister Lokuge
